TopicTitle: what happened to the free demo?

Articles.Content:
Hey guys,

Years ago before I bought the game I got the free demo. Lately I've been showing the game to a 10 year old aspiring kerbalnaut and he loves it. So naturally I thaught of the demo but I can't find it anymore on the website. Doesn't Squad offer it anymore?

It's slated to be replaced. 

Eventually.
